@noctemn2021 oh yeah this make sense, can always build aggregation on top

@noctemn2021 streaming music is better UX than CDs, unless you want to collect them as a collectible like vinyl (which is a niche market)

@noctemn2021 not sure how to track number of streams without users signing / confirming txns though, I still believe music streaming platform should stay web2 for the efficiency

@noctemn2021 thought about this too previously, I think ultimately subscription based model makes the most sense 

(i.e. user pays a subscription to a music streaming protocol, monthly payment to creators w.r.t. streams)
